p: Relative liver weight was significantly increased by APAP injection compared to that in the control group ( P < 0.01); however, both the silymarin and GMSYS 1400 mg/kg/day treatments significantly lowered the relative liver weight compared to that in the APAP group ( Fig. 2b, P < 0.01). Relative kidney weight was significantly decreased in the APAP group compared to the control group ( P < 0.01); however, this sign was alleviated in the silymarin or GMSYS treatment groups ( Fig. 2c).
